english.segment1: flying high with the crowd at night. we float on unseen fuel. each one sails, a gossamer sphere. our course unwinds like thread from a spool
english.segment2: what's it like inside the bubble?. say the souls who'd like to try. cut your tether; come and join me. we can swim across the sky
english.segment3: look at me with a childlike eye. and understand who's bound. why are those who are on the ground. afraid of falling down?
english.segment4: love has killed our fear. and when we're done we'll disappear
english.segment5: draws you out inside the ring. comes a holy breath of truth. setting free and sealing you. in eternal youth.
